function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of comprehensive strategic alignment models","Impact":"Ineffective decision-making and resource allocation in CRE management.","Mitigation":"Develop a comprehensive strategic alignment model to encompass all 15 key components.","Technologies":"N/A","People":"CRE managers","Owner":"CRE managers"},{"Description":"Inadequate adaptation to changes in office workplace management","Impact":"Decreased productivity, employee dissatisfaction, and inefficiencies in work processes.","Mitigation":"Implement workplace redesign strategies to adjust the physical environment to meet business and employee needs.","Technologies":"Office space design and layout technologies","People":"Office occupiers, CRE managers","Owner":"CRE managers, workplace designers"},{"Description":"Inefficiency in office space utilization","Impact":"Increased costs, wasted resources, and decreased workplace efficiency.","Mitigation":"Redesign and consolidate workspace, intensify space use through non-territorial offices, and invest in capital improvements to reduce churn time and cost.","Technologies":"Space utilization analysis tools, non-territorial office design technologies","People":"CRE managers, office occupiers","Owner":"CRE managers, facilities management"}]}
